job.title: Associate Data Engineer
job.description: SoFi Stadium is located at Hollywood Park and will be a yearround sports and entertainment destination located just four miles from Los Angeles International Airport The project covers 298 acres of office retail and residential space with the centerpiece of the district being a 70000seat stadium that will be the home of NFL games for both the Los Angeles Rams and Los Angeles Chargers SoFi Stadium and Hollywood Park will also play host to the 2022 Super Bowl the 2023 College Football National Championship and the Opening and Closing ceremonies of the 2028 Olympics as well as major concerts and other entertainment yearroundbrbrOur strongPURPOSEstrong is Creating Extraordinary Experiences one moment at a timebrbrOur strongPROMISEstrong is to be an iconic destination that celebrates our diverse and spirited community We promise to exceed expectations while cultivating a fun and safe experience where lasting memories are madebrbrOur strongCOMMITMENTSstrong are as followsbrbrstrongSAFETY FIRSTstrong we commit to safety as a top prioritybrbrstrongKEEP IT CLEANstrong we commit to the highest standard of cleanlinessbrbrstrongALL ARE WELCOMEstrong we commit to valuing and celebrating the diversity of our community our team and all that we servebrbrstrongSTRONGER TOGETHERstrong we commit to providing an environment that promotes teamwork mutual respect and recognizes the positive achievements of allbrbrstrongTHINK BIGstrong we commit to innovation inspiration and imagination in the delivery of extraordinary experiences through every interactionbrbrstrongSUMMARYbrbrstrongSoFi Stadium and Hollywood Park is seeking an Associate Data Engineer to manage our teams GCP data pipeline structure and development of marketing driven data modelsbrbrThis person should have a team player attitude and demonstrate a flexible and adaptable work style that responds quickly and efficiently under pressure SoFi Stadium and Hollywood Park are passionate about the guest experience for visitors and staff we supportbrbrstrongESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESbrstrongulliManage ETL and validate existing datasets within Google Cloud PlatformliliWork with IT other departments and external parties to define and document requirements and ideate data solutionsliliCreate and manage historical and real time data pipelines within GCPliliProvide data within Google BigQuery for ingestion into Google LookerliliWork with various vendor APIs to ingest data into our data warehouseliliDevelop and enhance current marketing data pipelineliliProvide guidance to junior members of the teamliliPotential availability for weekend eventsliliComfortable with ambiguity and ability to manage multiple amp competing prioritiesliliMay be called upon for service issues or failures at any timeliliStrong work ethic commitment to high standardsbrliulstrongQUALIFICATIONS brstrongulli1 years of experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar roleliliExperience using APIs returning JSON XML CSV formatted dataliliExperience with Google Cloud Platform and its products Dataflow PubSub Cloud Functions Cloud Storage BigQuery ApigeeliliExperience with data modeling large data warehousing and building ETL pipelineslili1 years of experience with Big Data platforms and architecture relational and no SQL database concepts with solid knowledge of SQL Python NodejsliliExperience with large IT project delivery for BI oriented projects Google Looker PreferableliliData visualization skillsliliBachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering Statistics Mathematics or related fieldbrliulPlease note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job Duties responsibilities and activities may change at any timebrbrstrongEQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITYbrbrstrongHollywood Park and SoFi Stadium strongly support equal employment opportunity for all applicants regardless of race color religion sex gender identity pregnancy national origin ancestry citizenship age marital status physical disability mental disability medical condition sexual orientation genetic information or any other characteristic protected by state or federal law
